document_data.mainbody:
The players first night in town is said to be Flamerule 21 (p. 37). Pontifel is slated for execution on Flamerule 22 (p. 38). Myrmeen adopted Krystin "about a year" ago, a reference to the events of The Night Parade, which is set in . We can thus surmise this adventure is set in .
"Storm Season" is a short adventure for Dungeons & Dragons 2 edition published in Dungeon #61.
 ()
